title: Genesis Chapter 14 Quiz
description: Test your knowledge of Genesis chapter 14 with 16 questions covering key people, places, events, and teachings from this chapter.

questions.question: What did Abram do in Genesis 14:19?
questions.explanation: Genesis 14:19 states: "And he blessed him, and said, Blessed be Abram of the most high God, possessor of heaven and earth:"

questions.question: What did the God do in Genesis 14:20?
options: Blessed be the most high God
Built an altar to the Lord
questions.correctAnswer: Blessed be the most high God
questions.explanation: Genesis 14:20 states: "And blessed be the most high God, which hath delivered thine enemies into thy hand. And he gave him tithes of all."

questions.question: According to Genesis 14:22, who said to the king of Sodom?
questions.explanation: Genesis 14:22 states: "And Abram said to the king of Sodom, I have lift up mine hand unto the LORD, the most high God, the possessor of heav..."

questions.question: Who said "to the king of Sodom, I have lift up mine hand unto the LORD, the most high G..." in Genesis 14:22?
questions.explanation: Genesis 14:22 states: "And Abram said to the king of Sodom, I have lift up mine hand unto the LORD, the most high God, the possessor of heav..."

questions.question: Complete this verse from Genesis 14:1: "And it came to ______ in the days of Amraphel king of Shinar, Arioch king of Ellasar, Chedorlaomer king of Elam, and Tidal king of nations;"
questions.explanation: The complete verse reads: "And it came to pass in the days of Amraphel king of Shinar, Arioch king of Ellasar, Chedorlaomer king of Elam, and Ti..."

questions.question: Complete this verse from Genesis 14:2: "That ______ made war with Bera king of Sodom, and with Birsha king of Gomorrah, Shinab king of Admah, and Shemeber king of Zeboiim, and the king of..."

questions.question: Complete this verse from Genesis 14:3: "All ______ were joined together in the vale of Siddim, which is the salt sea."
questions.explanation: The complete verse reads: "All these were joined together in the vale of Siddim, which is the salt sea."

questions.question: Complete this verse from Genesis 14:4: "______ years they served Chedorlaomer, and in the thirteenth year they rebelled."
questions.explanation: The complete verse reads: "Twelve years they served Chedorlaomer, and in the thirteenth year they rebelled."

questions.question: Complete this verse from Genesis 14:5: "And in the ______ year came Chedorlaomer, and the kings that were with him, and smote the Rephaims in Ashteroth Karnaim, and the Zuzims in Ham, and..."
questions.explanation: The complete verse reads: "And in the fourteenth year came Chedorlaomer, and the kings that were with him, and smote the Rephaims in Ashteroth K..."

questions.question: Complete this verse from Genesis 14:6: "And the ______ in their mount Seir, unto Elparan, which is by the wilderness."
questions.explanation: The complete verse reads: "And the Horites in their mount Seir, unto Elparan, which is by the wilderness."

questions.question: Complete this verse from Genesis 14:7: "And they ______, and came to Enmishpat, which is Kadesh, and smote all the country of the Amalekites, and also the Amorites, that dwelt in Hazezont..."
questions.explanation: The complete verse reads: "And they returned, and came to Enmishpat, which is Kadesh, and smote all the country of the Amalekites, and also the ..."

questions.question: Complete this verse from Genesis 14:11: "And they ______ all the goods of Sodom and Gomorrah, and all their victuals, and went their way."
questions.explanation: The complete verse reads: "And they took all the goods of Sodom and Gomorrah, and all their victuals, and went their way."
